name: Caterpillars
description: Attack of the Lettuce Munching Caterpillars - Shoot 'em up / Beat 'em up style game where you must squash all the insects within a given time limit. All the characters are modelled in plasticine "clay-mation",  whilst the music and sound effects are in retro 8-bit style.  Several waves of enemies must be defeated, then a Boss Man is faced at the end of each level.
